column1: Morwen is a character invented specifically for The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers. She is played by Robyn Malcolm.
Morwen was the mother of Freda and Éothain (film character)
column2: whom she sent to alert Théoden that the Dunlendings were pillaging through Rohan. Her children were kept at Edoras until Théoden led his people to shelter at Helms Deep
column3: where the children were reunited with their mother.

column1: The name Morwen is unusual for the Rohirrim
column2: being Sindarin and not Old English. Movie producers reasoned that this Elvish name would become popular in Rohan after the coming of Morwen Steelsheen
column3: the Gondorians queen consort of Thengel.
